role_summary: Attacks head-on with strength and ferocity.
favor_text: Brutes have no ranged attacks and move twice per turn.
notes: +1 to Hit Location rolls; +2 Damage; -2 Attack Skill; -2 Awareness.

role_summary: Waits for the perfect moment; swift strikes; returns to shadows.
favor_text: Favors melee combat over ranged abilities.
conditional_attack_skill_condition: Against opponents not directly targeting them
notes: No attack of opportunity when disengaging; +2 Awareness; conditional +5 Attack Skill vs not directly targeting.

role_summary: Stays at range; prioritizes ranged attacks.
conditional_attack_skill_mod: Favors ranged attacks over melee abilities.
column30: +1 to Hit Location rolls; +2 Awareness; +2 Ranged Attack Skill and -2 Melee Attack Skill.

role_summary: Many tiny individuals acting as one; overwhelms by numbers.
conditional_attack_skill_mod: No ranged attacks; moves twice per turn.
disable_hit_location_table_when_attacked: Treat as size roll 19-20 (larger than a single human)
column30: Attacks every single character at once; attacks against Swarms ignore Hit Location table; damage is automatically modified by +1.

role_summary: Defies physics; terrifying; uses psychic phenomena.
conditional_attack_skill_mod: Favors ranged attacks over melee abilities.
column30: Always roll on the Psychic Ability table instead of the standard one.
